column2: 기다려 주세요…
해금했다면 자기 탐지기
column3: 드론을 사용해 전차를 찾으세요. 해당 위치에 M키를 이용해 표시를 남기세요.

column1: M_EXTRACTION_STATUS_EXCAVATETANK_DESC*###*태블릿으로 돌아가 발굴 팀을 요청해 전차를 발굴하세요.
M_EXTRACTION_STATUS_LOADTANK_DESC*###*방사 메뉴를 열어 전차를 트레일러에 실으세요.

column2: 아무것도 없었습니다.
포수석으로 전환하세요.

column1: M_CRAFTING_BUYBLUEPRINTS_HINT*###*새 부품을 제작하려면 제작 패널을 이용하세요.

column2: 기다리세요...

column1: M_DESKTOP_BANK_DESCRIPTION*###*아래 슬라이더를 이용해 대출금을 설정하세요. 대출을 또 받으려면 기존 대출을 모두 상환해야 합니다. 대출을 모두 상환하지 않으면
column2:
또 다른 대출을 받을 수 없습니다.

대출을 받으려면:
대출금을 설정하고 대출 버튼을 누르세요.

대출을 상환하려면:
돈이 충분하면 대출 상환 버튼을 누르세요.

column1: M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_FLASHLIGHT_DESC*###*플래시라이트는 어두운 곳에서 주변을 볼 수 있게 해줍니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_SHOVEL_DESC*###*필수 발굴 도구 중 하나입니다. 아무 비용 없이 땅을 팔 수 있습니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_METALDETECTOR_DESC*###*필수 발굴 도구 중 하나입니다. 지하에 숨겨진 모든 금속 물체를 탐지합니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_TABLET_DESC*###*태블릿은 어디서든지 제어 패널에 접근할 수 있게 해줍니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_ANGLEGRINDER_DESC*###*앵글 그라인더는 녹슨 나사와 부품 자르기와 녹 제거의 두 가지 기능을 모두 가지고 있습니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_PISTOLWRENCH_DESC*###*피스톨 렌치는 나사를 더 빠르게 풀거나 조일 수 있습니다. 녹슨 나사를 풀 수도 있습니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_OFFROADVEHICLE_DESC*###*필수 발굴용 차량 중 하나입니다. 거친 지형을 필요한 모든 도구를 싣고 이동할 수 있습니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_QUAD_DESC*###*사륜차는 더 빠르고 거친 지형을 이동할 수 있습니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_MAGNETOMETER_DESC*###*자기 탐지기는 더 뛰어난 지면 스캔 기술을 제공합니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_DRONE_DESC*###*드론은 자기 탐지 기술을 이용해 공중에서 땅을 스캔합니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_TOOLBELT_DESC*###*작업용 도구를 직접 들지 않고 바로 사용할 수 있게 합니다.

column2: 위장 패턴을 고르고 데칼과 장식을 적용할 수 있습니다.

column1: M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_PARKING_I_DESC*###*주차장 1단계는 차고에 더 많은 전차 슬롯을 제공합니다 (+2).
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_PARKING_II_DESC*###*주차장 2단계는 차고에 더욱 많은 전차 슬롯을 제공합니다 (+4).
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_MUSEUM_I_DESC*###*박물관 1단계는 전차를 전시할 수 있는 박물관을 제공합니다! 4개의 전차 슬롯을 제공합니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_MUSEUM_II_DESC*###*박물관 2단계는 전차를 전시할 수 있는 더 많은 슬롯을 제공합니다! 8개의 전차 슬롯을 제공합니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_MUSEUM_III_DESC*###*박물관 3단계는 박물관의 첫 번째 방의 최종 버전입니다. 4개의 추가 슬롯을 제공합니다 (총 12개).

column2: 각 차고마다 6개의 슬롯을 제공합니다. 최대 차고 개수는 100개이며 {0}개의 차고를 소유하고 있습니다.

column1: M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_TESTDRIVEYARD_DESC*###*시험 운전장은 전차를 시험 운전할 수 있는 특별한 장애물 코스를 제공합니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_CRAFTINGTABLE_DESC*###*제작 테이블은 전차의 새 부품을 제작할 수 있게 해줍니다. 각 부품을 제작할 때에는 정해진 부품 조각들의 필요합니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_AUTOPAINT_DESC*###*자동 도색은 모래 분사기나 도색기 없이 자동으로 전차를 도색할 수 있게 해줍니다.
M_DESKTOP_INVENTORYSHOP_WAREHOUSE_II_DESC*###*작업실 2단계는 더 많은 작업 공간과 전차 슬롯을 추가해 동시에 더 많은 전차를 수리할 수 있게 해줍니다 (+2).

column2: 가격 감소: {0} %

column1: M_INTRO_DESC*###*Tank Mechanic Simulator. Developed by DeGenerals S.A. Published by PlayWay S.A. All rights reserved.

H_INTERACTION_BASICS*###*선택/줍기: 마우스 좌클릭. 조립/해체/줍기: 마우스 우클릭. 방사 메뉴 열기 - 마우스 휠 클릭.

column1: X_CANNOT_EXTRACT_WATERINTANK*###*전차 안에 물이 있습니다. 펌프로 뽑아내세요.
X_CANNOT_EXTRACT_TANKNOTDUGOUT*###*전차를 완전히 파내지 않았습니다. 태블릿으로 돌아가 발굴 팀을 부르세요.
R_GETINSIDE_DESC*###*내부 부품을 교체하기 위해 내부로 이동
R_MOVEMODULESELECTMODULE_DESC*###*선택한 모듈에 맞는 스탠드 메뉴 열기
W_CANNOT_REASON_NOSLOTS*###*빈 전차 슬롯이 없습니다. 먼저 전차 슬롯을 비우세요.
W_CANNOT_REASON_TOOLS*###*필요한 도구/차량을 전부 해금하지 않았습니다. 업그레이드 패널에서 {0}을(를) 먼저 해금해야 합니다.
W_CANNOT_REASON_MAXACTIVE*###*동시에 활성화할 수 있는 의뢰는 최대 3개입니다.
T_HELPLABELS*###*{0} - 튜토리얼 목록 열기 | {1} - 중요한 물체 하이라이트

T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_DESKTOP_DESC*###*이 패널에서는:

- 이메일 관리자 (새 의뢰 관리)
- 작업 관리 (현재 의뢰 관리)
- 전차 부품 상점 (전차 부품이나 설계도 구입)
- 은행 (대출)

T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_EMAIL_DESC*###*이 패널에서는 도착한 이메일을 관리할 수 있습니다.

이메일은 클릭해서 열어 볼 수 있습니다 (메일 목록에서).
이메일을 선택하면
column2: 의뢰를 수락하거나 거절할 수 있습니다. 또
column3: 이메일을 필터링할 수 있습니다 (예: 완료한 의뢰). X버튼을 누르면 이메일을 삭제할 수 있습니다.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_ORGANIZER_DESC*###*이 패널에서는 현재 활성화된 의뢰들을 관리할 수 있습니다.\n\n언제든지 아무 의뢰나 종료할 수 있습니다. 의뢰가 발굴 임무면
column2: 발굴을 이 패널에서 시작할 수 있습니다.\n\n기억하세요
column3: 성공 요건을 갖추지 못한 의뢰를 종료하면 벌금을 물게 됩니다.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_PARTSSHOP_DESC*###*이 패널에서는 전차에 필요한 부품을 구매할 수 있습니다.\n\n관심이 있는 전차를 먼저 선택한 후
column2: 원하는 부품을 구매할 수 있습니다. 또
column3: 각 모듈에 해당하는 부품만 필터링해서 볼 수 있습니다 (예: 기동 계통만).\n\n또 부품을 제작하는데 필요한 전차 설계도도 구매할 수 있습니다.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_BANK_DESC*###*이 패널에서는 은행 대출을 받을 수 있습니다.\n\n대출을 받기 위해서는
column2: 먼저 대출을 원하는 만큼 설정하고 대출 버튼을 누릅니다. 돈이 충분하다면
column3: 언제든지 상환 버튼을 눌러 대출을 상환할 수 있습니다.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_UPGRADE_DESC*###*이 패널에서는 3종류의 다양한 업그레이드들을 해금할 수 있습니다:\n\n- 도구 (새 도구나 차량
column2:
예: 그라인더)
- 운영 (예: 도색실)
- 패시브 (예: 부품 상점 할인).

업그레이드를 해금하려면
column3: 원하는 업그레이드를 선택한 후 해금 버튼을 누르세요.

column1:
T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_CUSTOMIZER_DESC*###*이 패널에서는 다양한 방들을 커스터마이즈 할 수 있습니다 (예: 박물관). 가능한 방들:
- 작업실
- 사무실
- 제작실
- 도색실
- 박물관
\가능한 커스텀:
- 벽/천장/바닥 재질
- 포스터
- (박물관) 스탠드
- (박물관) 전시물 스탠드
T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_RADIAL_DESC*###*이 패널은 플레이어가 사용할 수 있는 다양한 기능들을 보여줍니다 (예: 전차에게 사용할 수 있는 기능들).

T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_PAINTROOM_DESC*###*이 패널은 도색실에 있는 전차의 외관을 꾸밀 수 있습니다. 다양한 기능들:
- 전차 색 변경
- 데칼 적용
- 위장 변경

초기화 버튼으로 전차의 초기 상태로 돌아갈 수 있습니다 (전차 외관을 기본값으로 모두 변경합니다).

기억하세요
column2: 전차 외관을 바꾸려면 전차를 완벽히 복원해야 합니다 (도색까지).

column1:
T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_CRAFTING_DESC*###*이 패널에서는 전차 부품을 제작할 수 있습니다 (전차 부품 상점에서 설계도를 구매한 경우). 부품을 제작하려면:
- 전차 선택 (예: 티거 I)
- 제작하려는 부품 선택 (같은 부품 여러개 제작 가능)
- 제작용 조각이 충분하다면
column2: 제작 버튼을 눌러 부품을 제작할 수 있습니다.

column1:
T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_STORAGE_DESC*###*이 패널에서는 플레이어가 가지고 있는 부품들을 관리할 수 있습니다:
- 전차에서 해체한 부품
- 제작 패널에서 제작한 부품
- 전차 부품 상점에서 구매한 부품

전차를 선택하면 이 전차와 호환되는 모든 부품들이 표시됩니다.

부품으로 할 수 있는 것들:
- 재활용 (부품을 파괴해 제작용 조각 획득)
- 판매 (부품을 판매해 돈 획득)
- 수리 (부품 수리)
T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_ASSEMBLY_DESC*###*이 패널에서는 현재 선택된 부품에 다른 부품을 조립할 수 있습니다. 이 패널에 표시된 부품들은 현재 선택된 부품과 호환되는 부품들입니다. 또
column2: 호환되지만 다른 전차에서 온 부품도 여기에 표시됩니다.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_GUI_EXTRACTION_MAP_DESC*###*This panel allows the player to control the extraction mission by:\n- switching between contracting out excavation works at selected map location or controlling drone movement (only available when the player has drone unlocked)\n- switching between satellite map and ground penetrating radar scan (only available if player has magnetometer or drone)
T_INSTRUCTION_USABLE_DESC*###*There are various usable objects in Tank Mechanic Simulator. Some of them are pickable (like tools
column2: lamps etc.)
column3: some are toggles (like doors
column5: some are panel openers (like upgrade panel
column7: crafting panel etc.) To highlight all interesting usables in area

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_HAMMER_DESC*###*Hammer allows to disassemble tank part with a single direct hit on it. Any tank part that is targeted by the player (with the pointer) that is hit by the hammer (after clicking left mouse button) will fall off.\n\nRemember
column2: each struck tank part condition gets decreased on hit.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_RUSTREMOVAL_DESC*###*Rust Removal tool allows to remove rust from tank parts
column2:
in order to renovate the tank.

Renovation Scheme:
- Rust Removal
- Sand Blasting
- Applying Primer Paint
- Applying Standard Paint

If player targets a tank part while holding the tool
column3: and the tool is on (toggled on or off by pressing left mouse button) the rust will decrease.\n\nAll parts in close vicinity to the targeted tank part area de-rusted (the pointer is the place
column5: all parts that are touched by this sphere are de-rusting). This is useful when player wants to remove rust from hard-to-reach tank parts.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_SANDBLASTER_DESC*###*Sand Blaster tool allows to blast sand with very high pressure against targeted tank parts
column2:
in order to renovate the tank.

Renovation Scheme:
- Rust Removal
- Sand Blasting
- Applying Primer Paint
- Applying Standard Paint

If player targets a tank part while holding the tool
column3: and the tool is on (toggled on or off by pressing left mouse button) the sand will be blasted.\n\nAll parts in close vicinity to the targeted tank part are sand blasted (the pointer is the place
column5: all parts that are touched by this sphere are sand blasted). This is useful when player wants to sand blast hard-to-reach tank parts.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_PAINTGUN_DESC*###*Paint gun tool allows to paint the targeted tank part
column2:
in order to renovate the tank.

Renovation Scheme:
- Rust Removal
- Sand Blasting
- Applying Primer Paint
- Applying Standard Paint

If player targets a tank part while holding the tool
column3: and the tool is on (toggled on or off by pressing left mouse button) the paint or primer will be applied (depending on current paint mode - toggled by pressing {0} key).\n\nAll parts in close vicinity to the targeted tank parts are painted (the pointer is the place
column5: all parts that are touched by this sphere are painted). This is useful when player wants to paint hard-to-reach tank parts.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_GRINDER_DESC*###*Grinder tool allows to grind (de-rust) or cut (disassemble) the targeted tank part
column2: depending on current grinder mode
column3: switchable by pressing {0} key.\n\nIf player targets a tank part while holding the tool
column4: and the tool is on (by holding left mouse button) the part gets cut or grinded.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_MAGNETOMETER_DESC*###*Magnetometer allows to scan the ground during the extraction missions
column2:
providing that the player had previously unlocked this tool in the upgrade panel.

How to use:
- Pick the magnetometer by clicking on it
- Move around the area where you want to scan the ground
- The display mounted in the magnetometer shows any metal object it scans

When you're finished with scanning
column3: go to the tablet and switch the map mode
column4: from satellite to GPR scan. The scan should show the results (path and found objects) of your scanning.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_SHOVEL_DESC*###*Shovel allows to dig a small hole in terrains during extraction missions. It is one of the essential tools required to start an extraction mission. The shovel might be a useful tool to use when tou're not sure if you've found a tank - might be cheaper to dig a hole first
column2: before calling in big tools (excavation from tablet).

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_METALDETECTOR_DESC*###*Metal detector allows to detect any metal object hidden under the ground. When player has the metal detector in hand and a metal object is close
column2: the metal detector will make a notification sound. The frequency of the sound is higher as the player is closer to the detected metal object.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_WATERHOSE_DESC*###*Pressure washer allows player to clean the tank from mud and dirt. This is required to put the tank on truck trailer on extraction mission.

T_INSTRUCTION_TOOLS_PUMP_DESC*###*Pump allows player to pump out the water and mud from the surroundings of the tank. This is required to clean the tank with the pressure washer on extraction mission.
T_INSTRUCTION_AREA_WORKSHOP_DESC*###*Welcome to your workshop!\n\nIn this area player can renovate the tank
column2: that is currently stationed inside the area (or tanks
column3: if player unlocks level 2 of the workshop with multiple tank slots).

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_AREA_YARD_DESC*###*In this area player can park tanks (the area has more tank slots than workshop area does).\n\nAdditionaly
column2: there are trash/scrap molds in this area
column3: allowing the player to grind some crafting parts after clicking on them (untill depletion).

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_AREA_MUSEUM_DESC*###*In this area player can put tanks and found collectibles from extraction missions on display (to gain reputation
column2: spent in upgrade panel).

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_AREA_TESTDRIVEYARD_DESC*###*In this area player can put tanks to the test by driving them around the special obstacle course. Player can get inside the tank using the radial menu
column2: as well as start or stop the tank engine.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_AREA_TANKGRAVEYARD_DESC*###*In this area player can find tanks to buy or find scrap parts.\n\nTanks found here are mostly in very bad shape
column2: much worse state than any contract tank is.

column1:
T_INSTRUCTION_AREA_EXTRACTION_DESC*###*This is the area where the extraction mission gets done. Player's task is to find a tank with tools such as:
- Shovel
- Metal Detector
- Magnetometer
- Drone
- Vehicles (off-road car or quad)

Scheme to complete the extraction mission:
- check map (tablet in selected vehicle)
- get to the probable tank area
- use metal detector or magnetometer\drone to pin point the position of the tank (use {0} key to put map markers)
- use shovel to find the tank position
- when tank is found
column2: call for excavation in the tablet\n- when tank is dug out
column3:
pump out the water/mud out with the pump (turn it on and get the pipe inside the mud)
- clean the tank with ressure washer
- load the tank onto the trailer (with radial menu)
- return to workshop (from pause menu)

column1:
T_INSTRUCTION_TESTDRIVE_DESC*###*To put the tank to the test drive few requirements must be fulfilled:
- Tank modules: engine and turret have to be mounted
- Tank parts have to be fixed and mounted from modules:
- Engine
- Tracks
- Wheels
- Fuel system
- Gearbox

To start the test drive
column2: approach a tank and open radial menu on it. Select Test Drive Options
column3:
then select Start Test Drive.

To start the tank engine these parts need to be mounted and fixed first:
- Engine
- Fuel system
- Gearbox

Additionaly
column5:
fluids need to be filled:
- Coolant
- Fuel
- Oil

To start the engine approach the tank
column7: select Test Drive Options and select Start Engine. To fill fluids
column8: select Fill Fluids radial option in the Test Drive Options radial menu.

column2: it requires all fluids to be filled. Oil
column3:
coolant and fuel container can be filled individually using the radial menu.

How to fill the fluids:
- Select a fluid containter you want to fill (from radial menu
column5: then container - when there are more than 1 containers available)\n- With container selected
column6: hold left mouse button to fill the container\n With container selected
column7: click right mouse button to switch currently selected fluid containter (that is of the same type)

column1:
T_INSTRUCTION_STANDS_DESC*###*Some tank modules require to place them on special stands in order to be able to renovate them. To renovate engine or turret interior:
- Approach the tank and open radial menu
- Select Open Tank Modules Options
- Select the module you want to move
- Select the stand

With module on stand you can finally renovate it.
T_INSTRUCTION_DISASSEMBLY_DESC*###*To disassemble tank parts you need to:\n- Target a tank part\n- While aiming with pointer at the tank part
column2: press and hold right mouse button\n- If the tank part has any screws
column3: all of them need to be also unscrewed\n\nAll disassembled parts are put in the Storage panel.

column1:
T_INSTRUCTION_ASSEMBLY_DESC*###*To assemble tank parts you need to:
- Switch to Assembly mode (using the radial menu while pointing at the tank)
- Target a disassembled part
- Click and hold right mouse button while aiming at the tank part
- When Assembly Panel shows up
column2: select a part you want to mount\n\nMounted parts are removed from the Storage Panel.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_SCREWS_DESC*###*Some tank parts have screws attached to them. If you want to disassemble or assemble such part
column2: the screws need to be unscrewed or screwed in with the part. Some screws are rusted
column3: and need special treatment when interacting with them. To be able to remove rusted screws
column4:
player can use:
- Hammer (direct hit)
- Grinder (cutting mode)
- Wrench pistol (standard right mouse button interaction)

column2:
player can switch his current position with radial menu (most of tanks have the same set of crew positions):
- Commander
- Gunner
- Loader
- Driver
- Radio Operator

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_OFFROADVEHICLE_DESC*###*Offroad vehicle allows player to roam around the extraction missions. The vehicle has place for all required tools on extraction mission.\n\nTo pick up tools from the trunk or put tools inside
column2: approach the vehicle and left click the tool in a trunk
column3: or approach the vehicle with a tool and drop the tool. If the tool hits the vehicle
column4: the tool will be added to the trunk of the vehicle.

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_DRONE_DESC*###*Drone allows player to scan the ground on extraction missions. If the player has the drone unlocked
column2:
the drone will appear on the extraction missions. To control the drone:
- Approach the tablet in the offroad vehicle
- Open the tablet and click the Drone Control Mode button (switches the controls between drone controls and excavations)
- Click left mouse button on the tablet map to order the drone to fly to the designated location
- Check drone scan results in the GPR Map mode

column1: T_INSTRUCTION_MAPMARKERS_DESC*###*Map markers allow player to map any position on the map during extraction missions. To put a marker
column2: press M key. This will place a marker on your map and a little flag directly where the player is standing.

column1: T_DEMO_WELCOME_01*###*Welcome to the demo version of Tank Mechanic Simulator. We hope that you will have a good time with our game :)

T_DEMO_WELCOME_02*###*In the demo you can expect 3 tanks ready to be extracted or repaired.
- German legendary PzKpfw VI Tiger I Ausf. H1
- American famous  M4A3E8 Sherman
- Soviet steel beast KV-1.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_ASSEMBLEPART_DESC*###*Click and hold RMB on selected part to assemble it.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_BUY_FINALIZE_DESC*###*Click highlighted button to accept the transaction and buy previously selected tank parts.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_BUY_PARTS_DESC*###*To buy a new tank part
column2: select it from the list
column3: then click Checkout button.

column1: T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_CHECKMISSING_ANALISYS_DESC*###*Find greyed out parts on the list. These are missing parts that you need to buy and assemble. Remember their names and close this menu.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_DISASSEMBLEPART_DESC*###*Click and hold RMB on selected part to disassemble it.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_FINISHCONTRACT_DESC*###*Select contract from the list and click the highlighted button to finish the contract.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_FINISHCONTRACT_GENERAL_DESC*###*Open organizer Menu and finish the contract.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_MOVE_TANK_DESC*###*Reposition the tank to the Workshop. To do this
column2: approach the tank and open the radial menu (MMB) while looking at tank.

column1: T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_MOVE_TOTANK_DESC*###*Move to tank {0}. It is positioned in room: {1}.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_OPEN_STORAGEMENU_DESC*###*Select highlighted radial menu option to open Storage Menu.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_OPEN_TANKANALISYS_DESC*###*Approach tank and open the Radial Menu with MMB
column2: while looking at tank.

column1: T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_OPEN_PC_DESC*###*Approach and click LMB on highlighted PC.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_OPEN_ORGANIZER_DESC*###*Select highlighted button to open Organizer Menu.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_OPEN_SHOP_DESC*###*Select highlighted button to open Shop Menu.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_ORDERREPAIRS_DESC*###*Click the highlighted button to order the selected parts for a repairs.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_REPAIRPARTS_STORAGE_DESC*###*Select (LMB) parts that you want to repair
column2: and then click highlited button.

column1: T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_SELECTHIGHLIGHTED_PART_DESC*###*Approach and select (click LMB) any of the highlighted tank parts.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_SELECTTANK_STORAGE_DESC*###*Click highlighted button to open tank list. Select {0}.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_SELECTTANK_SHOP_DESC*###*Select the highlighted tank to open tank part menu for selected tank.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_START_EXTRACTION_DESC*###*Click highlighted button to start the extraction mission.
T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_SWITCHTODISASSEMBLY_DESC*###*In order to disassemble a tank part
column2: you need to be in disassembly mode.

column1: T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_SWITCHTOASSEMBLY_DESC*###*In order to assemble a tank part
column2: you need to be in assembly mode.

column1: T_STORY_OBJECTIVE_WAITFORREPAIRS_DESC*###*Now wait untill the parts are repaired. You can close the storage menu and work during repairs.
J_STORY_TITLE_08*###*Fix and put the tank into museum
J_STORY_TITLE_09*###*Take the tank to proving grounds

column2: that you have taken over the tank business after your father. I'm sending my condolences
column3: he was my dear friend.\n\n Now
column4: I want to help you start
column5: here is my proposition:\n- disassemble and repair broken parts in my KV-1
column6: then assemble the repaired parts back.\nGood luck.

column2: this time to be assembled.\nYou need to buy missing parts for my T34-76 in the online shop
column3: and then assemble them.\nGood luck.

column1:
J_STORY_DESC_03*###*Great work!

I don't have any tanks for you right now.
But I know about a place
column2: where you can find and dig out a tank – it will be yours.\nGood luck.
Tom
column3: has recommended you to us.\nWe would like to order de-rusting of the turret and hull exterior.\nWith respect

column1:
J_STORY_DESC_05*###*We have a bigger request.
We would like to order to de-rust as well as sand blast the exterior of the tank.

Good luck.
J_STORY_DESC_06*###*We would like to order a tank repairs\nFinal goal would be to apply primer to the whole tank.Additionally
column2: we would like you to replace parts that cannot be repaired by tools.\n\nWith respect

column1: J_STORY_DESC_07*###*I see that you are doing well
column2: congrats :)\nI would like to ask you for a little favor.\nOne of the tank from my collection requires its drive system and engine to be fixed. Afterwards
column3: take the tank to a test drive

column1: J_STORY_DESC_08*###*You've done great with last tank
column2: but I have yet another request.\nI would like you to renovate this tank fully
column3:
and put it in your museum for some time.

Just remember to give it back to me ;)

With regards

column1:
J_STORY_DESC_09*###*I have a nice treat for you.
I want to to mount the missing tank parts and then take the tank to the Proving Grounds.

Have fun.

column2:
congratulations on opening the museum.
I know your business will be successful.
As you know
column3:
I have a {0} waiting for renovation.
I would like to hire you for this job.
Are you interested?

Your {1}

column2:
I have a {0} in need of renovation.

Can you help me?

Sincerely

column1: J_DESC_REPAIR_3*###*Hey!\n\nNeed urgent help with {0} Let me know quickly
column2: this is really urgent!\n\n{1}

column1: J_DESC_REPAIR_4*###*Very nice {0} need few things to be replaced

column2: \n\nwe have run into information
column3:
that there is a tank ready to be extracted.

Are you interested?

Sincerely

column2:
we know where a hidden tank is!

We won't make it though
column3: can you help us?\n\n{0}

column2:
there is an abandoned World War II tank in our national park.

We ask for help in extraction of this tank.

With regards
we found something.

column1: STEAM_ABOUT_GAME_1*###*Tank Mechanic Simulator is a game about World War II tanks
column2: their crews and their contribution in military history.

column1: STEAM_ABOUT_GAME_2*###*As a tank museum owner your task is to recover destroyed or abandoned tanks and renovate them.
STEAM_ABOUT_GAME_3*###*Use your offroad vehicle to locate forgotten tanks. With final area found
column2: determine the exact position of the tank by using special equipment like metal detector. Set up excavation area and extract the tank!

column1: STEAM_ABOUT_GAME_4*###*Transport freshly extracted tank to your warehouse. Then start working on renovation process. Detach rusted elements and replace them with new parts. Buy them or fix them by yourself!
STEAM_ABOUT_GAME_5*###*Tank Mechanic Simulator contain physical terrain deformation system
column2: player will have to mind where and how does he want to travel and excavate.

column1: STEAM_ABOUT_GAME_6*###*"Perform the entire renovation program starting from:
STEAM_ABOUT_GAME_7*###*You can excavate even when the night comes! The game extraction missions have full night and day cycle implemented.
